original_title: Immagini disturbate da un intenso parassita
overview: Strains of Wagner's Das Rheingold and African tribal ululations collide with bi-/tri-sected television footage while negative-positive visuals smash heedlessly into their mirror images, an unbounded series of “meaningful” artistic fender-benders that amount to little of resonant substance.
title: Images Disturbed by an Intense Parasite
